name: Bean Boy and the Burrito Bomb (GDKO Round 2)
name_original: Bean Boy and the Burrito Bomb (GDKO Round 2)
description:
Info

Bean Boy is a 2022 Charcool Prototype made for GDKO Round 1.

Bean Boy is a prototype where your character cannot jump until they have fueled their fart power. You can fuel your fart power by collecting beans. The more beans you collect, the higher you jump, the amount of beans collected are synonymous with the bar on the top left of the screen. You can also place Burrito Bombs to destroy blocking obstacles

Controls

A & D and Arrow Keys to Move

Spacebar to Jump

LMB to place bomb at mouse position

New to Round 2

A Toy was added in the form of a Burrito Bomb

Comic Particles Appear when Bean Boy Jumps

More Areas to Explore

Jumping is less floaty

Height of Jump Changed

Boxes, Crates and Chests Added

Credit

Sound Effects: Zapsplat.com

Particles: JMO Cartoon FX | Unity Asset Store

Engine: Unity

Socials

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMzUQJQ_ZgAy4Za2EEi4X1w

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Charcool15

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/charcooldev

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/charcoolyt/

Extra Info

If you are unable to jump despite collecting beans, jump against a wall and you should be good.
